description: Contains nodes for creating arrays from bits and working with them. Creates a four-byte (20-byte) bit array with free access to the nth bit in the nth byte.

SkbigxkW9R.description: Resets the accumulated value to zero.
SkbigxkW9R.label: RST

SyPsle1W5C.description: Pulses when resulting Byte is updated
SyPsle1W5C.label: UPD

@/micros-to-number.description: Converts from type micros to type number. (unsigned integer)

@/micros-to-u32.description: Converts micros to a 32-bit unsigned integer presented as 4 bytes.

@/nbit-of-xbyte.description: Outputs the nth bit belonging to the xth byte from the array as a number of type "micro".

@/number-to-micros.description: Converts from type number to type micros . (unsigned integer)

@/shift-4-bytes.description:
Allows you to create a 4 bytes (00000000-FFFFFFFF) from a bit stream on the "BIT" input. Updates take place on the "INC" signal. You can also get the value of the nth bit from the "nBit" output (the number is specified in "n" from 0 to 7).
"inx" selects the byte from which we output "nBit" (from 0 to 3).
"NUMB" is the total accumulated value.

BJgMNJ56O0.description: Resets the accumulated value to zero.
BJgMNJ56O0.label: RST

HyMEBy9TuA.description: Pulses when resulting Byte is updated
HyMEBy9TuA.label: UPD

@/shift-bits-array.description: Forms an array of input bits. Recording of a new bit occurs with the "INC" signal. The length of the array is 20 bytes. The bit number specified in "IDX" is output to the "nBit" output.

Bkx4sZjoY0.description: Resets the accumulated value to zero.
Bkx4sZjoY0.label: RST

Hkgj8NhoYR.description: Pulses when resulting Byte is updated
Hkgj8NhoYR.label: UPD

@/shift-count.description: A counter that is counting forward shifts to the left by the number of bits specified by "SHIFT" before adding a new step. "STEP" and "SHIFT" must be >=0. (Counts unsigned integers)

S1bLM5e3A.description: A counter that is counting forward shifts to the left by the number of bits specified by "SHIFT" before adding a new step. "STEP" and "SHIFT" must be >=0. (Counts unsigned integers)

rJ-ZLfqehC.description: Value to add on each increment. Use a negative value (e.g. -1) to make decrements.
rJ-ZLfqehC.label: STEP

HJGbIG9l20.description: Resets the accumulated value to zero.
HJGbIG9l20.label: RST

name: shift-4-bytes
